name: * I M P O S S I B L E * BRICK BREAKER GAME (Windows)
name_original: * I M P O S S I B L E * BRICK BREAKER GAME (Windows)
description:
* * I M P O S S I B L E * * BRICK BREAKER GAME

Very hard, fast paced, 8 levels to pass trough and many keyboards and mice to break! 

Game is made as a practice in learning Unity Game Engine. This game is free!
